about_the_game:
ATTENTION: All events and heroes are fictional. Any coincidences with reality are random.

An adventure action first-person shooter game set in an abandoned scientific complex. The character, by some unfortunate chance, finds himself in the Siberian wilderness as a result of a plane crash. His main goal is to get back to people, and to do this he will have to fight off enemies, avoid marauder traps, and explore the environment in search of supplies.

- 9 types of weapons

- 3 locations for free exploration

- 8 types of enemies

- original plot

- world with elements of immersion and metroidvania

- realistic graphics

name: Shadow Lab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 580 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 30 FPS in 1920x1080 with "Low" preset.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X / Intel Core i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 60 FPS in 1920x1080 with the "High" preset.
